title: Architect’s Guide to a Reference Architecture for an AI/ML Data Lake
author: Keith Pijanowski
description: Organizations should not build an infrastructure solely dedicated to AI while leaving workloads like data analytics and data science to fend for themselves.
cntitle: AI/ML 数据湖的参考架构架构师指南
cndescription: 组织不应只建立专门用于人工智能的基础设施，而让数据分析和数据科学等工作自生自灭。
